fields.summary: User login with valid credentials should succeed
fields.description: As a user, I should be able to log in with my email and password. System should return a JWT token and redirect to the dashboard.

fields.summary: Invalid login should show error message
fields.description: When a user enters wrong credentials, the system should display a clear error message without revealing which field is wrong.
Users should be able to request a password reset. System sends an email with a time-limited reset link.

fields.summary: Mortgage calculator computes monthly PITI correctly
fields.description: Given principal, rate, term, tax, and insurance inputs, the calculator should return accurate monthly PITI breakdown.
The system should generate a full amortization schedule showing principal and interest breakdown per month for the entire loan term.

fields.summary: Loan comparison â€” side by side view
fields.description: Users should be able to compare two loan scenarios side by side, showing total interest, monthly payment, and total cost differences.

fields.summary: API rate limiting on all public endpoints
fields.description: Implement rate limiting (100 requests per minute per IP) on all public-facing API endpoints to prevent abuse.

fields.summary: Session timeout after 30 minutes of inactivity
fields.description: User sessions should automatically expire after 30 minutes of inactivity. Show a warning 5 minutes before expiry.
